channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sending Medicaid And Food Stamps Back To States Will Reduce Costs, Not Merely Shift Them
item.description: Because D.C. picks up the tab for food stamps and Medicaid, no one at the state level has any incentive to manage these programs responsibly.

item.title: Booking a flight on Delta is about to be a lot more complicated
item.description: Product name refresh will help people prioritize, airline says.

item.title: The Ungrateful Dead: Pete Rose, ‘Shoeless’ Joe Dying To Get Back Into Baseball
item.description: Is this heaven? No, it’s hell. Now that you're dead, welcome back to the Big Leagues. Makes a guy want to disappear into an Iowa cornfield.

item.title: Dick’s Sporting Goods just announced it’s buying Foot Locker for $2.4 billion in a move that could be the CEO’s first major mistake
item.description: Dick's shares plunging on news of the deal.

item.title: Supreme Court Chief Justice Roberts reins in Sotomayor after repeated interruptions
item.description: Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts interjected during Justice Sonia Sotomayor's questioning at oral argument on Thursday as she repeatedly talke...

item.title: Elon Musk’s AI says it was ‘instructed by my creators at xAI’ to accept the narrative of ‘white genocide’ in South Africa
item.description: "This directive caused me to inappropriately insert references to 'white genocide' into unrelated conversations," Grok told Fortune.

item.title: Trump says U.S. close to nuclear deal with Iran
item.description: President Trump said Thursday in Qatar that Iran had "sort of" agreed to the terms of a peace deal with the United States.

item.title: How the U.S.-China trade war’s 90-day pause was 70 years in the making
item.description: As Trump tries to gain leverage from tariffs, China is well aware of its strategic ace. So is Tesla CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: Gaza could be 'freedom zone' if U.S. takes it over, Trump says
item.description: President Trump suggested Thursday that the United States be in charge of Gaza and make it into a "freedom zone."

item.title: Can Congressional Republicans Be Big, Beautiful — and Pro-Family?
item.description: The House GOP mega-bill is full of odds and ends. Will it help families?

item.title: Don’t be fooled by deescalation, says UBS, Trump’s ‘surgical increases’ on specific sectors are yet to come
item.description: UBS's chief investment officer, Mark Haefele, wrote the White House may still make some cutting moves.

item.title: Dems divided on Trump's executive order aimed at slashing drug prices
item.description: Fox News Digital spoke with House Democrats about President Donald Trump's executive order aimed at slashing prescription drug prices.

item.title: Supreme Court takes on birthright citizenship: Liberals balk at Trump argument to end nationwide injunctions
item.description: Supreme Court Justices are weighing three challenges to Trump’s birthright citizenship order – a case that could quickly reshape how lower courts hand...

item.title: Introducing the Trump Doctrine
item.description: Prosperity and peace over anything else.

item.title: WaPo Columnist Twists Scripture To Argue Trans Feelings Matter More Than Yours
item.description: Instead of making an argument, Jennifer Finney Boylan cynically appropriates and manipulates Jesus' words to validate fallacious reasoning.

item.title: Enriching the Land of Enchantment
item.description: New Mexico offers a cautionary tale to those who believe policymakers can tax, spend, and regulate their states to prosperity.

item.title: Espionage, constitutional concerns abound from Trump detractors, allies over Qatari jet offer
item.description: Trump's plan to accept a $400M jet from Qatar sparks debate over constitutional legality and espionage risks, with mixed reactions from both political...

item.title: Trump’s Latest Order Could Keep You Out Of Prison For Crimes You Didn’t Even Know You Committed
item.description: A new executive order targets hidden criminal laws and restores basic due process to federal enforcement.

item.title: House Democrat delays impeachment push after resistance from colleagues
item.description: A House Democrat went rogue from his party in a bid to impeach President Trump, but relented after widespread resistance from his colleagues and House...

item.title: Trump’s Tariff Climbdown Will Make China More Confrontational
item.description: Whatever the flaws of Trump’s trade moves, capitulating early is terrible for the U.S. and for Trump himself.

item.title: Dem senator says 'no doubt' Biden declined cognitively during presidency
item.description: Democratic Sen. Chris Murphy of Connecticut said there is "no doubt" that former President Joe Biden suffered cognitive decline during his White House...

item.title: Colorado’s Transgender Sanctuary State Bill Is Too Radical For California
item.description: Colorado's transgender bill defines child sterilization as "medically necessary" and punishes anyone who opposes it.

item.title: The Danger of Outsourcing Our Brains
item.description: Counting on AI to learn for us makes humans boring, awkward, and gullible.

item.title: 'Why would he go?' Trump says of Putin's absence at Ukraine-Russia peace talks
item.description: President Trump said Russian President Vladimir Putin didn't show up for peace talks in Turkey on Thursday because he himself didn't go.

item.title: Private Equity at a Crossroads: A Conversation with Ludovic Phalippou
item.description: Oxford professor Ludovic Phalippou challenges the private equity status quo in a candid discussion on performance, transparency, and the future of the...

item.title: Trump's wheeling and dealing in Middle East secures $1.2 trillion from Qatar
item.description: President Trump had secured nearly $2 trillion in deals for U.S. companies, including more than $1.2 trillion in economic investment by Qatar, by the ...

item.title: AI Bias by Design: What the Claude Prompt Leak Reveals for Investment Professionals
item.description: A leaked AI system prompt reveals hidden biases in Claude's outputs. What every investment professional should know about using LLMs effectively.

item.title: How Clients’ Investment Goals Reflect Risk Behavior and Hidden Biases
item.description: Successful investing isn't just about numbers. It's about aligning strategy with the stories people believe about their future.

item.title: Two Enduring Legacies, One Oracle’s Exit, and “Buffett’s Alpha”
